ygData.subject: Re: Running away from monsters and "Scruffy"
ygData.msgSnippet: Scruffy is a pet of one of the guards, suggest leaving that critter alone. Have noticed that people with slower computers actually move slower in the game.  My
ygData.messageBody:
Scruffy is a pet of one of the guards, suggest leaving that critter alone.
Have noticed that people with slower computers actually move slower in the
game. My best friend was complaining constantly until i built him a P2 350.
May have something to do with the rate at which information is processed and
returned to the server (?)....now he says his performance in "running away"
seems to match other classes of his kind (always depends on how much weight
your carrying). some creatures your not going to outrun no matter how much
you try or how light you are. they are simply faster than us bipeds....


-----Original Message-----
From: Jason <IB_Jason@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, May 30, 1999 4:28 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Running away from monsters and "Scruffy"


>From: "Jason" <IB_Jason@...>
>
>Hello,
>
>This may sound like a newbie question, but that's probably because I'm a
>newbie. First question, is, no matter how hard I try, I can NEVER run away
>form anything. I jump while I run. I have tried strafing to the side while
I
>run. I just can't seem to do it. Also, I have seen a rat named "Scruffy"
>several times. Does this thing serve any purpose besides an extra rat?
>
>Thanks,
>-Faddor
>Level 6 Monk
>
